node.display_long_description:
THE NEW OCULUS AVATARS UPDATE IS NOW LIVE! 

PokerStars, the world’s leading poker brand, has combined live and online poker in a truly immersive VR experience.

-Study your opponents, pick up on their tells, and chat in real time
-Handle your chips and cards, just as you would at a real-world poker table
-Keep the table fun with interactive props and toys, summoned in an instant

This is the most exciting poker game on the planet, and there’s a seat open for you right now.

- Key Features -

-Authentic poker, blackjack & slots action
-A fully immersive, social experience
-Simple, intuitive, easy to play
-Play real opponents
-Realistic physics, from cards and chips to balloons, pistols and more
-Unlock free chips every day
-Certified RNG

- Exotic locales -

-Medieval Castle
-Cyber Apartment
-Evil Volcano Lair
-Macau 2050
-The Galaxy Space Station
-Macau Suite
-The Showdown Saloon
-The Monte-Carlo Yacht
-The Void

nodes.title: Slots Tournament Update!
nodes.body_text:
Hey everyone we have another great update for you here with [Patch 70] featuring all-new SLOTS TOURNAMENTS that we're launching with a limited-time chip sale going on now!

Check out the new Slots Tournaments sub-tab in the watch menu to register for and launch a tournament!

We're launching 2 new slots tournament Discord leader boards #slots-tlb-weekly #slots-tlb-monthly with exclusive items for the TLB winners.

You can check out the daily Slots Tournament schedule and payouts on our Discord in #slots-tournament-schedule

New Features
- Slots Tournaments

Bug FIxes
- Fix for spin and go mission win hands tracking as play hands
- Fix for cash bust players mission not tracking
- Fix for cash bet/raise chips mission not tracking when player all ins
- Updated Maraca Audio & Removed Auto Spawning

Join us on Discord

nodes.title: The Disconnection Protection Update!
nodes.body_text:
Hey everyone we have a major update for you here with [Patch 66] The Disconnection Protection Update!

This is a major technical upgrade to the game that allows players to rejoin a Sit & Go or Spin & Go tournament if they get disconnected.

This is a large scale change to the game if you encounter some initial bugs please report them on our Discord.gg/PokerStarsVR

New Features
-Disconnection Protection
-All in Percentages 
-Server Authoritative Poker [Major technical upgrade to the core game]

node.reviewDescription:
I have hundreds of hours in this game. Maybe thousands haha. It’s a great social experience! Unfortunately the new update is pretty bad with weird looking new avatars (subjective) and an ABUNDANT amount of bugs. I’ve always enjoyed the table talk but that’s about it. 

As far as poker goes, there’s clearly a system or algorithm in place that is designed to promote action at the table. This may make for some fun, but in turn it makes for very unrealistic poker hands to occur very consistently in regards to real poker. So be prepared for a LOT of bad beats! That being said there’s still room to bluff and make real poker plays, but don’t expect the statistics to be that anywhere near the real deal. 

The game crashes frequently on the quest 2. 
Almost every time I launch the game I have to quit and restart (sometimes I’m lucky enough to get the game running on the first try). When I finally do get the game to launch, it’s troublesome to connect to tables. The game menu is generally blank or it fails to connect to the servers. But after a few refreshes it will eventually work. 

Overall the game is fun and is worth the free download but can be frustrating at times. If you want a great social experience I would highly suggest! But If you’re a poker player looking to expand your skills or get some practice in, maybe just stick to the real poker tables.

developerResponse.body:
Hey ItsZuluu, we do not use some action packed RNG as you claim.  the PokerStars VR Random Number Generator (RNG) has been certified by iTech Labs, one of the leading accredited testing laboratories for online gaming worldwide. iTech Labs  has found that the card sequences in PokerStars VR are unpredictable, non-repeatable and uniformly distributed. The PokerStars VR RNG Certificate may be found here: 
https://itechlabs.com/certificates/luckyvr/RNG_Certificate_UK_LuckyVRInc_10Dec19.pdf
If you cannot access the game, please reach out to us in our #support channel on our server at Discord.gg/PokerStarsVR and we will look into things for you as quickly as we can.  We hope that you will update your review to let us know if we were able to assist you with your questions/issues, thank you.

website_page_meta.description:
THE NEW OCULUS AVATARS UPDATE IS NOW LIVE! 

Step into the future with this game-changing release from the biggest name in the business. Visually stunning environments; realistic chip and card movements; an endless supply of interactive toys, props and accessories; and the world’s best poker software powering multiplayer Texas Hold’em action.
website_page_meta.title: PokerStars VR · Oculus Quest
